title: Flails
content:
Flails in Baldur's Gate 3 are pieces of equipment that are used to inflict damage against hostile characters such as Enemies and Bosses. Flails are traitless Martial Weapons in BG3 that can be one-handed, dealing 1-8 Damage without enchantments. They have a range of 1.5m, and deal Bludgeoning Damage.
